body:
My mother taught me many gems from her jewelry box. One of the most valuable ones I remember- never blame a woman for a man's behavior, because it gives the man too much power.  As long as a man can blame someone else for their own behavior, they are free to do whatever they want.

Another gem-Until a man has put a ring on your finger and made vows to you, you are as free as he is.

Another gem-Until a man has put a ring on your finger and made vows to you, you are as free as he is.
title: My Mother's Most Valuable Gems

> never blame a woman for a man's behavior

Yet I'm sure the reverse is perfectly fine and even expected.

body: That is unacceptable as well. Blaming other's for your own failings can lead one down a very dark road.  We are all capable of that and probably done that as well. It's part of the human condition.

body: Even if you don't believe women deserve everything just for existing, which most people do, there's still the instinct in you that instantly perceives everything a man does as wrong and everything a woman does as good and innocent. What a man would spend 5 years in prison for a woman is totally justified according to our brains. The first reason is that females never really lose their innocent looking faces, while males develop tough, mean looking ones. As the face drastically changes our perception of someone, this will greatly alter how we feel about them. The second reason is that the female is more valuable for reproduction, so humans are hardwired to love and respect them at all costs, but this is not so for the male.
body_html: Even if you don't believe women deserve everything just for existing, which most people do, there's still the instinct in you that instantly perceives everything a man does as wrong and everything a woman does as good and innocent. What a man would spend 5 years in prison for a woman is totally justified according to our brains. The first reason is that females never really lose their innocent looking faces, while males develop tough, mean looking ones. As the face drastically changes our perception of someone, this will greatly alter how we feel about them. The second reason is that the female is more valuable for reproduction, so humans are hardwired to love and respect them at all costs, but this is not so for the male.
